00023 #ifndef MUTEX_HPP
00024 #define MUTEX_HPP
00025 
00026 #include "object.hpp"
00027 
00028 /*
00029  * Here, we choose the right implementation using
00030  * conditional compilation.
00031  */
00032 
00033 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32)
00034 #include "win32_mutex.hpp"
00035 #else
00036 #include "linux_mutex.hpp"
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 namespace uStreamLib {
00043         class US_API_EXPORT Mutex : public Object {
00044         public:
00048                 Mutex(void);
00049 
00053                 virtual ~Mutex(void);
00054 
00060                 int32 init(void)
00061                 {
00062                         int32 ret = _impl->init();
00063                         if (ret == FAILURE)
00064                                 return FAILURE;
00065 
00066                         setOk(true);
00067                         return SUCCESS;
00068                 }
00069 
00075                 int32 lock(void)
00076                 {
00077                         return _impl->lock();
00078                 }
00079 
00087                 int32 tryLock(void)
00088                 {
00089                         return _impl->tryLock();
00090                 }
00091 
00096                 int32 unlock(void)
00097                 {
00098                         return _impl->unlock();
00099                 }
00100 
00104                 char* getErrorString(void)
00105                 {
00106                         return _impl->getErrorString();
00107                 }
00108                 
00109         private:
00110                 /* specific implementation object */
00111                 Impl_Mutex* _impl;
00112         };
00113

00118         public:
00123                 MutexLocker(Mutex* mutex);
00124 
00129                 ~MutexLocker(void);
00130         private:
